Package com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2

This package provides classes and interfaces that support the more advanced version of custom location search.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CLE2DataManager.CLE2DownloadListener
    Represents a listener that reports information about the completion of layer download.
    CLE2Request.CLE2ResultListener
    Represents a listener that reports information about the completion of a custom location search CLE2Request.
    CLE2Task.Callback<ResultType>
    Used to notify the client of the result of the operation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLE2AttributeRequest
    Represents a custom geometry search request to retrieve all user-defined geometries along with its attribute on a specified layer.
    CLE2BoundingBoxRequest
    Represents a custom location search request that uses a bounding box to retrieve user-defined geometries.
    CLE2CorridorRequest
    Represents an corridor custom location search request to retrieve user-defined geometries previously stored using one or more search filter(s).
    CLE2DataManager
    This class is responsible for managing layer data for CLE2 offline use.
    CLE2Geometry
    Specifies a user-defined geometry.
    CLE2LayerMetadata
    Encapsulates metadata describing a CLE2 layer.
    CLE2MultiPointGeometry
    Specifies a user-defined multi point geometry.
    CLE2MultiPolygonGeometry
    Specifies a user-defined multi-polygon geometry.
    CLE2MultiPolylineGeometry
    Specifies a user-defined multi polyline geometry.
    CLE2OperationResult
    Encapsulates information about CLE2 data change that was a result of a local or remote data operation.
    CLE2PointGeometry
    Specifies a user-defined point geometry.
    CLE2PolygonGeometry
    Specifies a user-defined polygon geometry.
    CLE2PolylineGeometry
    Specifies a user-defined polyline geometry.
    CLE2ProximityRequest
    Represents a custom geometry search request that uses the area around a location to retrieve user-defined geometries.
    CLE2QuadkeyRequest
    Represents a custom location search request that uses quadkey.
    CLE2Request
    Represents a custom location search request.
    CLE2Request.CLE2Error
    Represents values describing possible search request errors.
    CLE2Result
    Stores the user-defined locations or geometries retrieved from a CLE2Request.
    CLE2Task<ResultType>
    Encapsulates an asynchronous CLE2 task (that usually involves network communication and/or database operations) and provides some common operations like observing, waiting for the result, cancelling or getting the result.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CLE2DataManager.OperationType
    Indicated type of operation performed on CLE2 data.
    CLE2DataManager.StorageType
    Indicates which class of storage was affected by the data operation.
    CLE2Request.CLE2ConnectivityMode
    Specifies the connectivity mode for a request.
    CLE2Request.CLE2Error.CLE2ErrorCode
    Error codes
    CLE2Request.CLE2GeometryType
    Specifies the geometry representation in the result.

Package com.here.android.mpa.customlocation2 Description

This package provides classes and interfaces that support the more advanced version of custom location search.

The following type of search is available:

  • Proximity - Search for user-defined locations around a specified point

To perform a search, create a request of the desired search type and execute the request. For example: 

     
     CLE2ProximityRequest request = new CLE2ProximityRequest("layer_id", new GeoCoordinate(11.11, 11.11), 100);
     request.execute(new CLE2ResultListener() { ... });

For more information on how to use this feature, please see the "Custom Location Search 2" section in the HERE SDK for Android Developer's Guide
